Dining

Drinks

  • Anvil
  • Double Trouble
    • Also coffee
  • Rosemont Social Club
    • This only looks OK
  • Sanctuari
    • Seems pretentious, cocktails look decent
  • Marfreless
    • No sign, blue door below 2006 number
    • Seems quiet and intimate, but no drink list
  • The Pastry War
    • Far (20 min by car; 30 by tram)
    • Awesome Drink List
  • Julep
    • (17 min by car)
    • Sameish Neighborhood as Pastry War
  • Moving Sidewalk
    • Same neighbord as Pastry War

Food (& Drinks):

  • Lucille’s
    • Southern!
  • Istanbul Grill
    • Well recommended Middle Eastern
  • Pasha
    • More of a sit-down Turkish
  • Punk’s Simple Soul Food
    • Southern
  • Cyclone Anaya’s
    • Local Tex-Mex Chain
  • Benjy’s
    • High end, New American
  • D’Amico’s
    • Deli-ish Italian
  • Local Foods
    • Sandwichs, Beer, Cocktails, All Texas-Made
  • Prego
    • Fancier, Well-regarded Italian (seasonal)
  • Mala Sichuan Bistro
    • Bit of a hike, but solid, authentic Sichuan
  • Torchy’s
    • Whatever
  • El Meson
    • Spanish, Cuban Tapas
